userdoc.notice: Fork of OpenZeppelin's PauserRole, but with the `renouncePauser` function removed to avoid fat-finger errors. We inherit from `Context` to keep this contract compatible with the Gas Station Network. See https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts-ethereum-package/blob/master/contracts/access/roles/PauserRole.sol
